text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: …Okay, got it. I'm looking forward to it! Fufufuu. Alright, just because it's parallel running, don't think I'll go easy on you~

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: …Okay! Thank you very much…!
From that day on, from dawn until dusk, Sakura Chiyono O could be seen on the grounds enthusiastically training.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Alright, starting from tomorrow, I should increase the number of rest intervals- Ah, good work!
She was eagerly looking at the notebook in her hands, the same one she had dropped before- the "ChiyoNote".

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: This contains everything I've learned up until this point. If I want to fight using everything I have- I figured I should use it.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: …If I'm not in it to win it, then, there'd be no point!
-And so, the day came.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Um… T-Today, I'll! Be running… as if I'm challenging… the Japan Derby! Please!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Fufu, Thanks. Then… I'll also be running at full power, okay?

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: uh…? Hey, look! The ones entering the gate are Maruzen-san and… Chiyo-chan?!
Here and there the gallery was gathering, the course is turf, 2400m, counter-clockwise. Sakura Chiyono O's once-in-a-lifetime battle was about to begin!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Fu…!

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text: Waa, Maruzen-san is pulling farther and farther ahead! But, Chiyo-chan is staying really calm. If it was me I'd probably be panicking and speeding up…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Eh, a plan? That's right… I did try giving it a bit of thinking but, well…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: …trying to keep up with Maruzen-san who specializes in a high pace escape run, turning it into a battle of attrition wouldn't increase my chances of winning.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: That's why, no matter how far Maruzen-san pulls ahead, I'll continue at my own pace and save my stamina for the end.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: And then… j-just before reaching the last corner I'll up my pace, and try to catch up to the escaping Maruzen-san-

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: I'll catch up and then hang on as long as I can, and at the end try to pull slightly ahead, no… I will pull ahead! Pull ahead and w-…w-win!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: …Honestly, there's alot that I'm lacking. But, if I want to win then, this method is the best option I think!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: (Stay calm, calm down, stay at my pace…! Soon, I'll be at the last corner…!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: …ku, here! Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: (…! Amazing acceleration! She was saving that much? It's a bit beyond my expectations-)

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: (…I see, Chiyo-chan, you're seriously trying to win, aren't you?)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: (I've caught up, I need to pull ahead, here, in front…!)

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, that's good!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: !! —Taaaaaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Uwaa, Maruzen-san's acceleration is really crazy…! …wait, huh? Chiyo-chan is catching up to her?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: …! —Fufuu!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: ! —Haaa, haaa! Not yet! Not yet, not yet! Not yet, not yet, not yeeeeet!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Daaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: …Ha, ha… haaa…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: (…I couldn't reach her. Even with a plan, giving it everything I had, even with all that, I still couldn't)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: (As I thought, she's still, really far away-)

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Chiyo-chan.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Thanks for the fun race! I haven't been that excited in a while! …Do your best in the real Japan Derby, too. I'll entrust my hopes to you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: …Maruzen-san's, hopes… …to me?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Yep. If it wasn't Chiyo-chan, I wouldn't do it.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: …kusu!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: I-I was…! O-on the verge of breaking! Chasing after someone as imposing as you, I didn't think I could reach!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Even while I was running, I was scared, there was no chance I was going to win…! But, but, as I thought-

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: I-I want to stay by your side!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: …Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: For sure… for sure! The "Japan Derby", I'll show you that I can win! I'll show you that I can become the strongest Uma Musume!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: That's why, when that happens, when I become stronger…! Will you run another race with me…?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: …Fufu! Of course!
And so, under this clear and sunny sky, her once-in-a-lifetime battle, came to a close.
With the race over, I started walking back to the Trainer's room when-

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Ah, hey, hey hey hey! Can you become my trainer?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: It was because of you! Because of you I was able to remember my feelings towards Maruzen-san. Because you gently pushed me forward…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: That's why! I'll grow bigger, and the next time I battle Maruzen-san, I want you to be there next to me too…!
Because of her earnest attitude, I was thinking that I wanted to continue watching over her growth. I had no reason to refuse.
choice_data_list: I look forward to working with you

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Waaa, I-I did it! Thank you very much! Well then, in that case… in commemoration, I'll tell you the proverb I just thought up!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: "Carrots, never know when it will rain." From now on, I look forward to working with you, Trainer-san!
